attributes.action: Give free renewable energy to all homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give all households who wish to take part free renewable energy to their homes, be it wind or solar. The government foots the bill.  This way we all win.  Why spend however much on advertising change, when this money can be spent on creating change saving the environment and our pockets as well as creating energy that could be put back in the national grid reducing the amount of PowerStation’s we need. Or wont the energy giants allow this as they will loose there profits.
